title: Roasted Summer Vegetable Orzo
ingredients: ['1 courgette, sliced', '1 yellow summer squash, sliced', '1 red onion, cut into chunks', '450g asparagus, cut into 2.5cm pieces', '450g portabello mushrooms, thickly sliced', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 pinch caster sugar', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '4 cubes chicken stock', '4 tablespoons dry white wine', '450g orzo pasta', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
